bio.1: I am a problem solver who enjoys turning ideas into meaningful digital experiences. In my development process, I focus not only on building functional solutions but also on creating user-centered, sustainable, and impactful products.
bio.2: I see every challenge as an opportunity to grow, innovate, and think more creatively. I enjoy working on projects that have real-world impact and always approach my work with curiosity, motivation, and a strong desire to learn.

items.description: I am a 3rd-year Computer Engineering student at İstanbul Rumeli University with a GPA of 3.62/4.00. During my studies, I have completed courses such as Object-Oriented Programming, Data Structures, Computer Architecture, Visual Programming, and Numerical Analysis. I develop personal and academic projects using Java, JavaScript, React and Next.js. I am particularly interested in software development, algorithms, and data analysis, and I am continuously working to improve myself in these areas.

Learned web development technologies including JavaScript, React, and Next.js during the internship. Developed a personal portfolio website using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS to showcase my projects and skills. Built a simple blog application where users can view and add posts, applying component-based architecture and basic state management. Gained hands-on experience in modern web development processes and project implementation.
